Authors:
E. Khaledi, J. Nahvi Moghadam, Jafar Abdollahzadeh, J.
Amini
Title:
Pestalotioid fungi associated with esca disease of grapevine
with description of three new Sporocadaceae species in Kurdistan
Province, Iran
Abstract:
Three new species of Sporocadaceae are described
associated with grapevine trunck dieases (GTDs) namely; Seimatosporium
marivanicum, Sporocadus kurdistanicus and Xenoseimatosporium
kurdistanicum.
